name: Plane Maze: The Junk Food Tunnel
name_original: Plane Maze: The Junk Food Tunnel
description:
Plane Maze : The Junk Food Tunnel This Game is about maze thrill with impulsive mouse flight controller experience to get out of infected Junk Food which is lurking in the dark makes a job more Jammy

Story is there was nice times at Fruity, as their economy and society keeps boasting by their healthy fruitiness. One day Potato fell into oil lava which turn the pure potato into mindless French Fries who started infecting other foods to what is now known as "Junk Food" era. When this news got up, Captain Avocado is on the mission to find the survivors back to safety!

( I made Storyboard and and Level Design so the Player feel not joy but thrill and fear of what happened in the Tunnel Scene as your Captain Avocado travels to save Fruity People. Levels above and further Story Writing is endless possibilities as this scene is so flexible for future development continual ) The Controller is = Mouse  *check yourself have fun  *for hardcore, use keyboard keys

[Secrets] There is one purposefully glitch to fly out and explore the Mountain of Fruits 

I am Syed Ahmed Malik and this Game Jam really made me Jams, I originally planned a different project but I am happy that I finally finished it in 7 hours. I joined the Game Jam a week later it's started and I then started working with two programmers through Epiphany discord, but as situations turned out of natural causes ( e.g. Rain/ Electricity Blackouts ) I had to complete it all by myself, however I am not a programmer but I'm pretty happy with how I pulled it. 

Also review the models, I made them! Yay my First Game!

Have a Fantastic Day \ Indie Fun!
